vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H0450H', 'matchingForm': 'אֶלְיָדָע', 'stepTransliteration': 'el.ya.da', 'gloss': 'Eliada', '_searchResultRange': '1Kgs.11.23', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '以利雅大', '_es_Gloss': 'Eliada', '_zh_Gloss': '以利雅大'}, {'strongNumber': 'H0450I', 'matchingForm': 'אֶלְיָדָע', 'stepTransliteration': 'el.ya.da', 'gloss': 'Eliada', '_searchResultRange': '2Chr.17.17', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '以利雅大', '_es_Gloss': 'Eliada', '_zh_Gloss': '以利雅大'}, {'strongNumber': 'H1182', 'matchingForm': 'בְּעֶלְיָדָע', 'stepTransliteration': 'be.el.ya.da', 'gloss': 'Beeliada', '_searchResultRange': '1Chr.14.7@2Sam.5.16-1Chr.14.7', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '比利雅大', '_es_Gloss': 'iada', '_zh_Gloss': '比利雅大'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.5.16;
son of: David (H1732);
brother of: Amnon (H0550), Chileab (H3609), Absalom (H0053), Adonijah (H0138), Shephatiah (H8203), Ithream (H3507), Shammua (H8051H), Shobab (H7727), Nathan (H5416), Solomon (H8010), Ibhar (H2984), Elishua (H0474), Nepheg (H5298H), Japhia (H3309I), Elishama (H0476H), Eliphelet (H0467), Tamar (H8559H), Elpelet (H0467I), Nogah (H5052) and Jerimoth (H3406N); also called Beeliada at 1Ch.14.7;
Also named: be.el.ya.da (בְּעֶלְיָדָע "Beeliada" H1182)
§ Eliadah or Eliada = "God knows"
1) a son of David
2) a Benjamite warrior chief
3) an Aramean, the father of an enemy of Solomon
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) בְּעֶלְיָדָע   hijo de David; tribu de Judá; (b)   padre de Rezón, rey de Damasco; (c)   jefe del ejército; en tiempos de Josafat
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利雅大 或 以利亞大 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "神知道"
1) 大衛王的一個兒子 (撒下 5:16; 代上 3:8)
2) 一位便雅憫支派戰士的領袖 (代下 17:17)
3) 一位亞蘭人, 他是所羅門王的敵人利遜的父親 (王上 11:23)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以利雅大 或 以利亚大 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "神知道"
1) 大卫王的一个儿子 (撒下 5:16; 代上 3:8)
2) 一位便雅悯支派战士的领袖 (代下 17:17)
3) 一位亚兰人, 他是所罗门王的敌人利逊的父亲 (王上 11:23)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.11.23;
father of: Rezon (H7331)
§ Eliadah or Eliada = "God knows"
1) a son of David
2) a Benjamite warrior chief
3) an Aramean, the father of an enemy of Solomon

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.17.17
§ Eliadah or Eliada = "God knows"
1) a son of David
2) a Benjamite warrior chief
3) an Aramean, the father of an enemy of Solomon
